details.access_and_opening_times:
About us

Visit our profile page for more about the work we do.

Opening hours

Due to security considerations, public access is by appointment only.

Telephone: 9am to 4pm Monday to Thursday, 9am to 1pm Friday (excluding public holidays)

Emergency consular assistance following the death, hospitalisation, arrest, or other serious incident involving a British national is available 24 hours by calling +1 876 936 0700

Visa enquiries

  Service not offered at this location

Check if you need a visa or send an enquiry to UK Visas and Immigration.

Passports

  Service not offered at this location

Find out how to apply for a British passport or send an enquiry to Her Majesty’s Passport Office.

Services available by appointment in Kingston

Make an appointment on-line for the following services, or contact us by telephone for further help.

Make an appointment for an Emergency Travel Document

Make an appointment for a notarial or documentary service

Disabled Access

Our offices are fully equipped with facilities for disabled visitors. If you need special assistance, please contact us before you arrange an appointment.

Press enquiries

Our press team answers media enquiries about the work of the UK government and the British High Commission in Kingston. To contact the press team, please call +1 876 936 0700

Department for International Trade (DIT)

DIT helps companies succeed in the global economy. We also help overseas companies bring their high-quality investment to the UK’s dynamic economy, acknowledged as Europe’s best place from which to succeed in global business.

Public holidays in 2018

On the following public holidays, our office will be closed for normal business. Emergency consular assistance for British nationals is available by telephone.

  • Monday 1 January
  • Wednesday 14 February
  • Friday 30 March
  • Monday 2 April
  • Monday 7 May
  • Wednesday 23 May
  • Monday 28 May
  • Wednesday 1 August
  • Monday 6 August
  • Monday 27 August
  • Monday 15 October
  • Tuesday 25 December
  • Wednesday 26 December
  • Monday 31 December
